name: Holy Spirit
blurb: Divine agent of conception, anointing, speech, and mission—integral to the triadic baptismal name.
searchText: holy spirit divine theology divine agent of conception, anointing, speech, and mission—integral to the triadic baptismal name.

name: Jesus of Nazareth
blurb: Davidic and Abrahamic heir, true Israel in one person. Matthew stresses fulfillment: virgin conception (Isa 7:14), Bethlehem birth (Mic 5:2), exodus recapitulation (Hos 11:1), temptation victory, auth
searchText: jesus of nazareth person messiah davidic and abrahamic heir, true israel in one person. matthew stresses fulfillment: virgin conception (isa 7:14), bethlehem birth (mic 5:2), exodus recapitulation (hos 11:1), temptation victory, authoritative torah fulfillment (5:17–20), suffering servant and risen lord.

name: Simon Peter (Cephas)
blurb: First among equals—confessor and denier, restored to lead. Keys of the kingdom signify teaching/judicial authority under Christ.
searchText: simon peter (cephas) person apostle first among equals—confessor and denier, restored to lead. keys of the kingdom signify teaching/judicial authority under christ.

name: Book of Signs (index)
blurb: Seven signs commonly counted from Cana to Lazarus; resurrection stands beyond as climactic reality.

blurb: Passovers (2:13; 6:4; 11:55), an unknown feast (5:1), Tabernacles (7–8), Dedication (10:22).
